start_sources()
# -- resourcecompilerxml.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "CryCommonTools"
		"../../CryCommonTools/FileUtil.h"
		"../../CryCommonTools/PathHelpers.cpp"
		"../../CryCommonTools/StringHelpers.cpp"
		"../../CryCommonTools/PathHelpers.h"
		"../../CryCommonTools/StringHelpers.h"
	SOURCE_GROUP "CrySystem"
		"../../../CryEngine/CrySystem/XML/XMLBinaryNode.cpp"
		"../../../CryEngine/CrySystem/XML/XMLBinaryReader.cpp"
		"../../../CryEngine/CrySystem/XML/XMLBinaryWriter.cpp"
		"../../../CryEngine/CrySystem/XML/XMLBinaryNode.h"
		"../../../CryEngine/CrySystem/XML/XMLBinaryReader.h"
		"../../../CryEngine/CrySystem/XML/XMLBinaryWriter.h"

		"../ResourceCompiler/IConfig.cpp"

		"XMLConverter.cpp"

		"stdafx.cpp"

)
sources_platform(WIN32)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "CryCommonTools"
		"../../CryCommonTools/FileUtil_windows.cpp"
)
sources_platform(LINUX)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "CryCommonTools"
		"../../CryCommonTools/FileUtil_posix.cpp"
)
end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

CryResourceCompilerModule(ResourceCompilerXML PCH "stdafx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "RC")
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE 
	"${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ResourceCompiler" 
	"${CRYENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/Tools" 
	"${CRYENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/Tools/CryXML"
	"${CRYENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/Tools/CryCommonTools"
	"${CRYENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CrySystem/XML")
target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE /EHsc)
set_target_properties(${THIS_PROJECT} PROPERTIES LINK_FLAGS "/DEF:ResourceCompilerPlugin.def")

ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND(TARGET ${THIS_PROJECT} POST_BUILD
	COMMAND "${CMAKE_COMMAND}" -E copy "\"${CRYENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/Tools/RC/ResourceCompilerXML/xmlfilter.txt\"" 
	"\"${CRYENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Tools/rc\""
	COMMENT "Copy xmlfilter.txt into output folder.")
